Write-Up Text: Hey there! A lot of people have been buzzing about the upcoming Australian Federal Budget and its impact on the nation's most vulnerable communities particularly those living below the poverty line. With Aussies feeling the squeeze of cost-of-living pressures the budget's focus on helping low-paid aged care workers and reducing low-income migrant intake has garnered mixed responses. However some have raised concerns regarding the future of the nation's beloved Australian Broadcasting Corporation (ABC) due to the budget's silence on the matter.
